acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should assign precise values and lengths when a String is annotated with @PodamStringValue
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldAssignPreciseValuesWithTheStringValueAnnotation

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.StringValuePojo
Then the Object TSu3OejH17ZYUEwXlNXx should not be null
Then the string value TSu3OejH17ZYUEwXlNXx should have the length of 20
Then the Object preciseStringValue should not be null
Then string [preciseStringValue] should be exactly like string [preciseStringValue]
